entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 70 late in the morning. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
